product_name: BugBand Insect Repellent Spray - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: BugBand Insect Repellent spray with geraniol can be easily applied directly onto exposed skin to form a protective barrier against bloodsucking bugs. Using geraniol, a natural ingredient derived from geranium oil, BugBand insect repellent provides hours of protection. Effectively repels mosquitoes, ticks, flies, fleas, gnats and no-see-ums. Spray liberally over exposed skin. BugBand Insect Repellent spray uses absolutely no DEET.
short_description: BugBand Insect Repellent spray with geraniol can be easily applied directly onto exposed skin to form a protective barrier against bloodsucking bugs.
